document_data.mainbody:
he Twilight domain was a divine domain for clerics of deities whose portfolio involved the transition from light to darkness, rest, and protection. Clerics who chose this domain were granted free access to these spellsâ€”they could cast them at any time without having to prepare them in advance.
Novice clerics of this domain could cast faerie fire, sleep, moonbeam, and see invisibility. Those of some experience were able to use the aura of vitality, Leomunds tiny hut, aura of life, and greater invisibility spells. Master clerics of the Twilight domain were skilled enough to cast circle of power and mislead. In addition, they were able to use twilight sanctuary.
